mapper.select: select count(*) over (partition by 1) total_rows, tmp_navigation_results.nhdplus_comid, st_asgeojson(nhdflowline_np21.shape) shape from nhdplus_navigation.tmp_navigation_results join nhdplus.nhdflowline_np21 on tmp_navigation_results.nhdplus_comid = nhdflowline_np21.nhdplus_comid where session_id = #{sessionId}

select count(*) over (partition by 1) total_rows, nhdplus_comid, st_asgeojson(nhdflowline_np21.shape) shape from navigation_results join nhdplus.nhdflowline_np21 on navigation_results.comid = nhdflowline_np21.nhdplus_comid

select count(*) over (partition by 1) total_rows,
from navigation_results join nldi_data.feature on navigation_results.comid = feature.comid join nldi_data.crawler_source on feature.crawler_source_id = crawler_source.crawler_source_id where lower(source_suffix) = #{dataSource}

select count(*) over (partition by 1) total_rows,
from nhdplus_navigation.tmp_navigation_results join nldi_data.feature on tmp_navigation_results.nhdplus_comid = feature.comid join nldi_data.crawler_source on feature.crawler_source_id = crawler_source.crawler_source_id where session_id = #{sessionId} and lower(source_suffix) = #{dataSource}

with recursive navigation_results(comid, hydroseq, startflag) as (select comid, hydroseq, startflag from characteristic_data.plusflowlinevaa_np21 where comid = #{comid,jdbcType=NUMERIC} union select x.comid, x.hydroseq, x.startflag from characteristic_data.plusflowlinevaa_np21 x, navigation_results where navigation_results.startflag != 1 and (x.dnhydroseq = navigation_results.hydroseq or (x.dnminorhyd != 0 and x.dnminorhyd = navigation_results.hydroseq)) ) select 1 total_rows,
st_asgeojson(st_simplify(st_union(catchmentsp.the_geom), .001)) shape
st_asgeojson(st_union(catchmentsp.the_geom)) shape
from navigation_results join characteristic_data.catchmentsp on navigation_results.comid = catchmentsp.featureid

select
from nldi_data.feature join nldi_data.crawler_source on feature.crawler_source_id = crawler_source.crawler_source_id where lower(source_suffix) = lower(#{featureSource})
